ComicInfo.Summary:
As Tefe's obsession with Heather Strand grows, she and her crew begin their first mission: rescuing Heather from the Secret Service agents who are guarding her. Meanwhile, Agent Romero is set on erasing everyone who ever has met Tefe, and the trail of bodies grows.
